text: Hey, journo friends... you should follow @_thehalparker @WHSV_Autumn. They are talented young journalists who are going places. You might be working with them one day.
author: l_whittington

text: Thanks, @_thehalparker @WHSV_Autumn! These stories were close to my . Great to profile all these talented @longwoodu alums & proud of so many others out there. Looking forward to continuing to follow all of these bright careers.
author: l_whittington

text: She’s a great reporter with a bright future… and a @longwoodu alum to boot.
author: l_whittington

text: Hey @smithjuliec… you interested in moving to Pigeon Forge?!?
author: l_whittington
